oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diary of Capt. Daniel Hoge Bruce
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Diary of Capt. Daniel Hoge Bruce, Co. A, 51st Va. Inf. Regt., CSA. Bruce was captured at "Waynesborough by Sheridan's cavalry" on March 2, 1865 and sent to Ft. Delaware Prison. The diary contains song lyrics, poems, autographs from fellow soldiers, and details on his capture, imprisonment, and subsequent return home after the end of the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
